channel.title: Sunspots on Archive 03
channel.description: Recent content in Sunspots on Archive 03

item.title: Sunspots and Bull Markets: A Cosmic Connection?
item.description: Is there really a link between sunspots and stock market bull runs? Three girls clash over this mystical theory, which dates back to a 19th-century economist. Through Mikael’s sharp analysis refuting the science and Kurumi’s insistence on the ‘power of story,’ we explore what this old legend truly means for modern investors.
